entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
